name: e2payments-wp Payment for Woocommerce
author: explicador

sections.description:
The Mpesa plugin for WooCommerce is an extension for WooCommerce and WordPress that allows you to receive payments directly in your online store through Vodacom Mozambique’s M-Pesa API and the e2Payments platform.
e2Payments records all relevant transaction details, including the customer’s IP, browser, contact used, amount paid and more. It is very easy to confirm whether a customer has really paid for your service or not. The administrative panel allows all users to carry out transactions (receive payments) directly through the platform. All in a simple and safe way.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

  1. Log in to your WordPress dashboard
  2. Click Plugins > Add New in the left menu.
  3. In the search box, type e2payments-wp Payment for Woocommerce.
  4. Click Install Now in e2payments-wp Payment for Woocommerce to install the plugin on your website and then click activate the plugin.
  5. Click on WooCommerce> Settings in the left menu and click on the Payments tab.
  6. Click on e2payments-wp Payment for Woocommerce in the list of available payment methods
  7. Configure e2payments-wp for WooCommerce settings using credentials available at https://e2payments.explicador.co.mz

Manual installation

If the automatic installation does not work, download the plugin here using the Download button.

  1. Unzip the file and upload the folder via FTP to the wp-content/plugins directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Go to Plugins > Installed Plugins and click Activate in e2payments-wp Payment for Woocommerce.
sections.faq:
What is E2Payments

E2Payments is an electronic payment solution and online financial services.

How can I register with E2Payments

To register with E2Payments, you can visit the official website and follow the registration process.

E2Payments offers customer support

Yes, E2Payments offers customer support. You can contact support through the website, by phone, or by email, depending on the contact options provided by the company.
